text: Pabitra masa pabitra masera khatire, ara saba nisid'dha byapare pratisodha nite habe. Kaje'i ye ke'u tomadera upare akramana calaya, tomara'o tabe tadera upare aghata hanabe se'ibhabe yemanata tara tomadera upare aghata karechila. Ara allahâ€Œke bhaya-srad'dha karabe, ara jene rekho nihsandeha allah dharmabhirudera sathe achena.
